Quote.Speaker: Jim
Quote.Text: All right, let's get started. Umm... Oh, first off, we're supposed to be pushing cardstock this week. So... let's push cardstock this week. Uh, also... [to Dwight] what is this?

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: Tape recorder.

Quote.Speaker: Jim
Quote.Text: For what?

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: For recording. Michael is on vacation and he's asked me to record all meetings and to type up the transcripts.

Quote.Speaker: Jim
Quote.Text: OK. Uh, Karen, any news from that law firm?

Quote.Speaker: Karen
Quote.Text: Yeah, the deal closed yesterday, it's the six month commitment.

Quote.Speaker: Jim
Quote.Text: Oh my God, Dwight, what're you doing?

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: What?

Quote.Speaker: Jim
Quote.Text: You're not allowed to take off your pants in the middle of the office.

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: I'm not.

Quote.Speaker: Jim
Quote.Text: Dwight, you know what, just back up, okay, that's making me uncomfortable. This is sexual harassment, by the way. Oh my God! He's got a knife!

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: I do not have a knife!

Quote.Speaker: Jim
Quote.Text: No, let the record show that Dwight K. Schrute is now completely nude and is holding a plastic knife to Stanley's neck?!

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: [leans into tape recorder] Let the record show that Jim Halpert is a liar!

Quote.Speaker: Jim
Quote.Text: [picks up tape recorder and speaks into it] Dwight Schrute is now wearing a baby's bonnet.

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: Give me it. I am not.

Quote.Speaker: Phyllis
Quote.Text: Oh, Jim Carrey just walked in! Dwight, get his autograph for Michael quickly...

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: Jim Carrey did not just walk in, OK.

Quote.Speaker: Karen
Quote.Text: Dwight, what is that on your stomach? Is that a Muppet Babies tattoo?

Quote.Speaker: Jim
Quote.Text: Oh my God, Karen, you're right, that is Animal from the Muppet Babies.

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: You can't see... You can't see my stomach.

Quote.Speaker: Andy
Quote.Text: I am now chopping off Phyllis' head with a chainsaw! ... Rin-in-in-in-in-in!

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Hey, mon!

Quote.Speaker: Pam
Quote.Text: Hey. You have a bunch of messages and... [sees Michael shaking head with beads in hair] that's nice. Hannah quit while you were gone. I guess she memo-ed to file some complaints she had about being a working mother? And so you might also have to be deposed.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Blah, blah, blah, blah, blah, blah, blah, blah. Relax.

Quote.Speaker: Pam
Quote.Text: OK.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Just relax, OK? I'll get to all of it later.

Quote.Speaker: Pam
Quote.Text: It's kind of serious.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Aren't you going to ask me how Jamaica was? Say it. Ask me.

Quote.Speaker: Pam
Quote.Text: How was Jamaica?

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: It was so good. Oh, Hey mon! At Sandals, Jamaica, when somebody says "Hey mon," everybody says "Hey mon" back.

Quote.Speaker: Stanley
Quote.Text: Oh, Michael, I'm glad you're here.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Stanley. You know what? It is really good to see you, too.

Quote.Speaker: Stanley
Quote.Text: My bonus check was a hundred dollars less than you promised.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: OK, well payroll is in charge of all that.

Quote.Speaker: Stanley
Quote.Text: They said I should talk to you.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Well, I am just getting settled in. So, I'm gonna...

Quote.Speaker: Stanley
Quote.Text: I am not doing a lick more work until I get my full bonus check.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: You are not as much fun as your Jamaican brothers... mon.

Quote.Speaker: Jim
Quote.Text: You want to talk about it?

Quote.Speaker: Karen
Quote.Text: Nope.

Quote.Speaker: Karen
Quote.Text: I still haven't found an apartment yet. I'm living in a hotel. Yesterday, I saw a "for rent" sign down the street from Jim and he said he didn't think it'd be such a good idea. He said it would be like we were living together. In different houses. Two blocks away.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Feelin' hot, hot, hot! [playing conch shell] Feelin' hot, hot, hot! Feelin' hot, hot, hot! Feelin' hot, hot, hot! That's all I know so far, but I'm gonna keep practicing.

Quote.Speaker: Pam
Quote.Text: That's good. [Michael continues to play conch shell]

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: You know, I had never been out of the country before now?

Quote.Speaker: Pam
Quote.Text: Huh.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Got to see how Jamaicans live. It is great, you know. They just relax, they party all the time.

Quote.Speaker: Pam
Quote.Text: It's kind of an impoverished country.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Yeah... Gosh. Great. You know what, Pam? Make a note. I want us all to start having pina coladas every day at three.

Quote.Speaker: Pam
Quote.Text: But you can't today, we're doing inventory.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Inventory's at the end of December.

Quote.Speaker: Pam
Quote.Text: We couldn't do it without you, so we postponed.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: I specifically went on vacation so I would miss it.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Inventory is boring. In the islands, they don't make you do stuff like take inventory. Why do you think so many businesses move to the Caymans?

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Tonight, we are going to have an inventory luau. I want to bring back a little slice of paradise to the Dunder Mifflin warehouse inventory. So, Party Planning Committee, get on it.

Quote.Speaker: Angela
Quote.Text: By the end of the day? That's impossible.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: The Jamaicans don't have a word for "impossible."

Quote.Speaker: Jim
Quote.Text: Yep, it's English, it's "impossible."

Quote.Speaker: Angela
Quote.Text: Michael, there's no way we can do it in time.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: How hard is a luau? All you need are some grass skirts, pineapple, poi, tiki torches, suckling pig, some fire dancers. That's all you need.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Come on in. Settle in. Settling. Settling... and settled. Good, there is something I would like to show everybody. See this sign? [points to a TV monitor of a picture from Jamaica and reads] "No Shirt, No Shoes, No Problem." This is an attitude I would like all of you to have right here. So what, if we have to stay late to do inventory? No problem.

Quote.Speaker: Pam
Quote.Text: Oh my God. Is that Jan? [points to same monitor]

Quote.Speaker: Everybody
Quote.Text: What? Where?

Quote.Speaker: Pam
Quote.Text: On the left.

Quote.Speaker: Everybody
Quote.Text: Oh yeah, oh my God.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: No, no, no. No, that's a German woman named Urkel Grue.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Jan told me to play it cool and not tell anybody because it can get us both in trouble. So officially, I did not see her. But I did see Jan there. In our room. At night. And in the morning. That's all I'm gonna say. Sex. We had sex. I had sex with her. I had sex with Jan.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: [on phone] Hey dude. I just got back from Jamaica.

Quote.Speaker: Packer
Quote.Text: Big whoop! I was in Hot-lanta. That whole town is whacked.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Yeah, that sounds amazing. You know what? The lady Jan Levinson wanted to go to Montego Bay.

Quote.Speaker: Packer
Quote.Text: You took the ice queen? I don't buy it.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Well I'm looking at a photo, right now. And I'm telling 'ya, could be in Maxim.

Quote.Speaker: Packer
Quote.Text: They wouldn't give you a subscription to Maxim.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Oh no?

Quote.Speaker: Packer
Quote.Text: No.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: OK. Well, check this out. I am sending you some email. You got it?

Quote.Speaker: Packer
Quote.Text: Well, no. I got nothing.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Check it again. Hit refresh.

Quote.Speaker: Packer
Quote.Text: Yeah, Mike, still nothing.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: OK, wait a second. I sent it to you at... [reading computer screen] [email protected] Packaging@DunderMifflin.com. Uh oh.

Quote.Speaker: Packer
Quote.Text: Wait, I just got it from somebody else. Wow. This is hot. Damn! How do I get you out of this picture?

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Darryl?! Hey. Hi. Where's Darryl?

Quote.Speaker: Roy
Quote.Text: He's in the office.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: OK, Hey, man, how's it going?

Quote.Speaker: Darryl
Quote.Text: All right, what's up Mike?

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: That's great, OK. Um, so did you get an email from me?

Quote.Speaker: Darryl
Quote.Text: Yup.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: OK. Well, that was supposed to go to Packer, not "packaging." Did you already, um, forward to a whole bunch of people?

Quote.Speaker: Darryl
Quote.Text: Uh huh.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: OK. Um, well, did you get the second email that I sent? Explaining that the first email was a mistake and that you should delete it.

Quote.Speaker: Darryl
Quote.Text: Yup.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: And you sent that out to everyone?

Quote.Speaker: Darryl
Quote.Text: Mike, I'm very busy down here. [eats chicken]

Quote.Speaker: Jim
Quote.Text: Yikes.

Quote.Speaker: Kevin
Quote.Text: Already sent it to you my friend.

Quote.Speaker: Jim
Quote.Text: Fantastic.

Quote.Speaker: Andy
Quote.Text: Boring. Call me if she rolls over.

Quote.Speaker: Pam
Quote.Text: Hey.

Quote.Speaker: Jim
Quote.Text: Hey.

Quote.Speaker: Pam
Quote.Text: You OK?

Quote.Speaker: Jim
Quote.Text: Yeah.

Quote.Speaker: Pam
Quote.Text: You sure?

Quote.Speaker: Jim
Quote.Text: Yeah. Yes. Um, I'm just in this, like, stupid fight with Karen.

Quote.Speaker: Pam
Quote.Text: Oh. You want to talk about it?

Quote.Speaker: Jim
Quote.Text: Really?

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: I have a special assignment for you.

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: Who's the target?

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: A sensitive email has been released to the office. It contains a file, a picture. The file name is "Jamaican Jan Sun Princess."

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: What's it of?

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Not important.

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: Unless you're willing to tell me everything, I cannot accept this assignment.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: OK, forget it.

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: OK, I accept it.

Quote.Speaker: Jim
Quote.Text: So, I dunno, I just feel likes we've been dating a month, right? Same street. I think that might be a little close. A little much.

Quote.Speaker: Pam
Quote.Text: Hmm.

Quote.Speaker: Jim
Quote.Text: Hmm, what?

Quote.Speaker: Pam
Quote.Text: How far away does she live now, like ten minutes?

Quote.Speaker: Jim
Quote.Text: Yeah, I guess.

Quote.Speaker: Pam
Quote.Text: Honestly, I think you should go easy on her.

Quote.Speaker: Pam
Quote.Text: No, I didn't mind helping Jim with his problem. That's what friends do. I help Phyllis all the time. Just yesterday, I untangled a piece of tape from her hair. So, yeah.

Quote.Speaker: Jim
Quote.Text: Hey, thanks a lot.

Quote.Speaker: Pam
Quote.Text: Oh, don't worry about it. I mean, it's better than listening to Michael play a conch shell... which is what I was doing. Oh, also, Michael went to Jamaica with Jan!

Quote.Speaker: Jim
Quote.Text: Oh, yeah, How have we not talked about this already? I mean what happened there? Kidnapping? [both start laughing]

Quote.Speaker: Toby
Quote.Text: Hey I need to talk to you right now.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Not now, not ever.

Quote.Speaker: Toby
Quote.Text: About you and Jan.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Aww, none of your business.

Quote.Speaker: Toby
Quote.Text: Wish it were true, but it, it uh, seems from that photo that you took, you've entered into an intimate relationship.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: That photo is my personal property and if you are telling me you went on my computer and stole that photo, then I am going to call the cops.

Quote.Speaker: Toby
Quote.Text: Michael, nine different people emailed me that photo, including my ex-wife... we don't talk now.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: This is probably the icebreaker you need.

Quote.Speaker: Toby
Quote.Text: You know, for your own protection, you should disclose the relationship to HR.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: I bet you would love all the details, wouldn't you? Skeevy little perv.

Quote.Speaker: Toby
Quote.Text: All right, if you're having a relationship with your superior, you must disclose it.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: No, no, no. I am not dating Jan. She was very clear about that. Just two like souls having a romantic time in the most romantic place on earth. Got enough, weirdo?

Quote.Speaker: Toby
Quote.Text: All right, thanks Michael.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: OK.

Quote.Speaker: Angela
Quote.Text: OK, we only have three hours people to plan a whole luau, and you're not helping.

Quote.Speaker: Karen
Quote.Text: What are the ingredients of poi?

Quote.Speaker: Phyllis
Quote.Text: I called every grocery store in Scranton, and no one sells whole pigs.

Quote.Speaker: Angela
Quote.Text: Did you try the petting zoo?

Quote.Speaker: Pam
Quote.Text: [on phone] Dunder Mifflin, this is Pam. Just a second. Michael, it's Jan on the phone for you.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Oh, God, no. No, no! Hang up! Hang up! Tell her I'm not here. Tell... tell her, I ran out for cash. I hit a deer. I hit a deer with my car. Tell her I hit a cat. Tell her I hit a cat.

Quote.Speaker: Pam
Quote.Text: He'll call you back. OK, great.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: She bought it? [Pam nods] OK. OK.

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: [to Jim and Ryan] Michael hit a deer?

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: Michael! Michael! [pokes head through blinds in Michael's office] There's an emergency in the warehouse.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: There an accident? Somebody hurt?

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: No, it's... involves the photograph.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Oh. God. No, no, no, no, no.

Quote.Speaker: Roy
Quote.Text: [starts clapping] Mike, you are a rock star, man. You are the man! Well done.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: All right. [continued clapping and cheering for Michael]

Quote.Speaker: Roy
Quote.Text: That corporate booty, he likes to hit it!

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Hello. Hi. Attention everyone. Um, apparently, there is an email circulating around that contains a very PG-13 rating picture of me and a woman--

Quote.Speaker: Kevin
Quote.Text: Jan.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: No, Kevin. A woman. Maybe Jan, maybe...

Quote.Speaker: Jim
Quote.Text: Urkel Grue.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: My point is that, if you get it, I would ask that you just delete it. Sight unseen. Let's be professional, all right?

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Feelin'... feelin' hot, hot, hot! [plays conch shell]

Quote.Speaker: Pam
Quote.Text: Hey.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Hey.

Quote.Speaker: Pam
Quote.Text: What are you doing out here?

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Island living. You know?

Quote.Speaker: Pam
Quote.Text: Jan called. She's coming in later to talk to you.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Did she say what it's about?

Quote.Speaker: Pam
Quote.Text: That's all she said.

Quote.Speaker: Andy
Quote.Text: Ole ole - ole ole... Ole ole - ole ole. People in the party - hot hot hot [playing conch shell]

Quote.Speaker: Jim
Quote.Text: Uh, I think you dropped this [hands over piece of paper]

Quote.Speaker: Karen
Quote.Text: You sure?

Quote.Speaker: Jim
Quote.Text: Definitely.

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: I have disconnected the office T1 line. I have ordered that that [referring to large picture of Michael and Jan in Jamaica on the wall] be taken down and destroyed all print outs from the bathroom.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: There are copies in the bathroom?

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: There were. A lot of them.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: All right.

Quote.Speaker: Karen
Quote.Text: I think I owe you one.

Quote.Speaker: Pam
Quote.Text: Sorry?

Quote.Speaker: Karen
Quote.Text: For talking sense into Halpert. The Day's Inn room 228 was starting to get really depressing.

Quote.Speaker: Pam
Quote.Text: Oh, yeah, no. Don't worry about it. I mean, he was being ridiculous.

Quote.Speaker: Karen
Quote.Text: Yeah, but... thanks. Seriously.

Quote.Speaker: Pam
Quote.Text: Sure.

Quote.Speaker: Darryl
Quote.Text: Oh, yes! Yes! What'd I tell you? I knew he'd turn up [holds up an iPod inside speakers] You see that? This is the greatest night of my life.

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: Who did this to you? [refers to Pam crying] Where is he?

Quote.Speaker: Pam
Quote.Text: What? No, it's not... it's nothing.

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: [takes off coat to tie around waist] It's hot in here.

Quote.Speaker: Pam
Quote.Text: Yeah.

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: Yeah.

Quote.Speaker: Pam
Quote.Text: [Dwight hands out handkerchief] Thanks. You don't need to stay here.

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: I know. [puts arm around Pam who continues to cry] So you're PMSing pretty bad, huh?

Quote.Speaker: Jan
Quote.Text: Hello everyone. Hello Michael.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Guh.

Quote.Speaker: Kevin
Quote.Text: Hi Jan, you look... tan.

Quote.Speaker: Jan
Quote.Text: I was in Scottsdale visiting my sister.

Quote.Speaker: Kevin
Quote.Text: Yeah. How was it?

Quote.Speaker: Jan
Quote.Text: Very sunny. Family's important. Michael, I would like to speak with you, in your office.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: OK, yup.

Quote.Speaker: Jan
Quote.Text: Why am I here, Michael?

Quote.Speaker: Jan
Quote.Text: In the last year, I've gone through a divorce, an identity theft, a husband who would not... communicate. This is nether here or there. My psychiatrist thinks that I have some self-destructive tendencies and that for once, I should indulge them. You following me?

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: I... I... Yes.

Quote.Speaker: Jan
Quote.Text: I think I owe it to myself to find some kind of happiness, you know? I mean, even, even if it means... lowering my expectations or, or redefining the word, itself.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: OK, yeah.

Quote.Speaker: Jan
Quote.Text: This is the kind of thing, you know? I am... attracted to you. I, I don't know why, I... but, I am. And, I need to follow my instincts. At least that's what Dr. Perry thinks.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Who is Dr. Perry? I...

Quote.Speaker: Jan
Quote.Text: This is the point, OK? You're wrong for me. In... In... every way. But I still find myself wanting to... be with you.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: And I, to you, in addition, feel the same feelings that you are as well.

Quote.Speaker: Jan
Quote.Text: Good, good.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: So, umm... thanks for coming by. So, I, uh...

Quote.Speaker: Jan
Quote.Text: Well, good, OK. Thank you... for taking the time...

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Well thanks for coming over, I appreciate - [Jan leans over and kisses Michael passionately]

Quote.Speaker: Jan
Quote.Text: Wait 15 minutes, find an excuse, and meet me at your condo.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Jan, you... complete... me.

Quote.Speaker: Jan
Quote.Text: Oh, God.

Quote.Speaker: Roy
Quote.Text: Hey, remember when we were planning our honeymoon and you wanted to go to Hawaii and I wanted to go to Mexico?

Quote.Speaker: Pam
Quote.Text: Yeah.

Quote.Speaker: Roy
Quote.Text: I was definitely right. [both laugh] Oh, brother.

Quote.Speaker: Kevin
Quote.Text: What am I going to do? [Refers to large pictures of Jan and Michael] I'm gonna hang it up at home. I don't have a lot of art. [smirks]

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: I just had the best, most romantic week of my life in Sandals, Jamaica. Went with a lady, and we laid on the beach and drank fruity drinks for free, because it was all-inclusive. And then I flew back to Scranton, and then they lost one of my bags.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Hey, Mister tally man, tally me banana, six hand, seven hand, eight hand, BRUNCH! [snickers] So delicious. Dinner, too. And every morning I would watch the sunrise and I would eat a mango. That is how I want to feel all the time. It's called island living. You know, how they say take a chill pill? In Jamaica, I took one. Guy on the beach sold it to me for $40. And after I finished vomiting, I was more relaxed than I ever have been. Lost six pounds, too. That's how I want every day to be.

Quote.Speaker: Pam
Quote.Text: Michael sends me a postcard from every vacation he goes on. Atlantic City, he wishes I was here. Busch Gardens, Virginia, all I got was this lousy postcard. And this time, I'm Jamaican-him-crazy. I don't know how far away he thought he was, because he put $10 worth of stamps on this.

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: Hello, you're back.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Yeah, mon. Me just got back to the office.

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: While you were gone...

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Me had an i-rey time.

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: While you were gone, Jim glued my desk drawers together. He changed my voicemail so that my voice sounded like a chipmunk. He told me that we had a meeting at 4:00 AM, and I was the only one who showed up.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Dwight, please, please.

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: He turned over my...

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: I just got back from vacation, mon, all right? So chill. Let's don't... Don't harsh my mellow, mon.

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: I took a vacation once. Never again. While I was away, Jim had my desk shipped to me in Roswell.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Presents. I got presents for everybody. Dwight, a genuine Rastafarian wig.

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: Unbelievable.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Andy, I got you a genuine Jamaican T-shirt. They love Milli Vanilli down there.

Quote.Speaker: Andy
Quote.Text: I give thanks, mon.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: You are so welcome, mon. Angela, you just got leied. [puts lei on Angela]

Quote.Speaker: Angela
Quote.Text: No, I didn't.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Yes, you did. Okay. Oh, Pam, I forgot to get you something.

Quote.Speaker: Pam
Quote.Text: That's okay.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: I'm just kidding. Coconuts for your coconuts!

Quote.Speaker: Pam
Quote.Text: No.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: [laughs] Try it on.

Quote.Speaker: Pam
Quote.Text: No.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Go ahead. Let me know if I miscalculated the size. I don't think I did.

Quote.Speaker: Pam
Quote.Text: Thank you.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Stanley, I got you some ganja. I'm just kidding. It's coffee. I bet you wish it was ganja.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: I just got back from vacay. Come on. Give me a break, man. [holds up CD] Waves over Jamaica, $6.99.

Quote.Speaker: Creed
Quote.Text: Did he actually give you some ganja?

Quote.Speaker: Stanley
Quote.Text: No.

Quote.Speaker: Creed
Quote.Text: You want some?

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Okay, let me tell you a little story. When I was on vacation, I met a man named Bavon. And Bavon takes people parasailing. And you know what he said to me? He said that he loves going to work every day. How many of you can say that you love going to work every day like Bavon? [Dwight and Andy raises hand] No one.

Quote.Speaker: Kevin
Quote.Text: But, Michael, Buvon gets to go parasailing every day, and that's fun.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: His name is Bavon. And you know what? I'm sure Bavon gets sick of his job, too. I'm sure he would like to take a day off. I'm sure he would like to spend a vacation selling paper, but he has the right attitude. And that is something that you learn when you go to Jamaica, and you really apply yourself.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: I would love to take them all to Jamaica, but is that good management? Yes. But is it the best management? Well, I can't afford it, and corporate won't pay for it. So who's the real criminal?

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: How many of you know the meaning of the Jamaican term, Hakuna Matata?

Quote.Speaker: Jim
Quote.Text: [raises hand] Are you stoned?

Quote.Speaker: Jim
Quote.Text: In the picture, are you high?

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Oh, that's red eye.

Quote.Speaker: Jim
Quote.Text: Is that not what happens when you're high?

Quote.Speaker: Kevin
Quote.Text: You look like you have the munchies.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Well...

Quote.Speaker: Kelly
Quote.Text: I have the munchies. I'm gonna get some of those chocolate wafers.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Hey, can we just focus?

Quote.Speaker: Pam
Quote.Text: Michael and Jan together in Jamaica. I guess I would just need a little bit more evidence than seeing it with my own eyes.

Quote.Speaker: Ryan
Quote.Text: I don't know if Michael and Jan really went to Jamaica, because Michael's way into Photoshop. For example, I never went with him to Egypt. [holds up picture with Michael and himself in Egypt]

Quote.Speaker: Phyllis
Quote.Text: Where did you save the list of exchanges?

Quote.Speaker: Stanley
Quote.Text: I will gladly give you that information when my bonus comes through.

Quote.Speaker: Phyllis
Quote.Text: But I won't be able to do inventory without it.

Quote.Speaker: Stanley
Quote.Text: Then you won't be able to do inventory.

Quote.Speaker: Phyllis
Quote.Text: Yeah, I really like Stanley, but I'm not always sure if he likes me. I guess that's okay, 'cause I don't really like him.

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: Come on. Come on.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Okay. Well, Jan's email password is not Dunder Mifflin, Sandals, Jamaica, Michael, Michael Scott, Jan Scott, or Mrs. Jan Scott.

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: Try Dwight.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Her passwords aren't going to be Dwight, Dwight. That's stupid. Okay.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Don't you have some sort of chaser or gobbler thing that you can send out that's able to eat up that other emails? I read about something like that. Well, I am in America and I am online, so I do think it involves you. Uh-huh. And if I were a subscriber, would then you be able to send out the gobbler? I'd... Yes, I will hold.

Quote.Speaker: Someone
Quote.Text: So your trip to Scottsdale was good?

Quote.Speaker: Jan
Quote.Text: Oh yeah, Arizona's beautiful. Yeah. It's great to... great to see my sister.

Quote.Speaker: Someone
Quote.Text: Burnt.

Quote.Speaker: Jan
Quote.Text: Oh, yeah, I know. I don't... I don't normally lay out in the sun a lot, but, you know, when it's Scottsdale... I was visiting my sister and...

Quote.Speaker: Meredith
Quote.Text: When a woman gets older, she'll go just about anywhere with just about anyone. I've done some things I'm not so proud of, but I've seen the world.

Quote.Speaker: Angela
Quote.Text: Your body is a temple. You have to respect it. You can't just whore it out.

Quote.Speaker: Kevin
Quote.Text: I should be turned on. But, last year, remember, I had that skin cancer scare, and so now all I can think is that I hope she was wearing sunscreen. God, I would love to rub some on her.

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: The worst part about the Internet, when a secret is out, everyone knows. The best part about the Internet, that video of the dancing Indian midget, crossbow.org, massively multiplayer online gaming, i.e. Everquest. I also enjoy online banking.

Quote.Speaker: Pam
Quote.Text: Okay. So I went on the Internet, and she is not gonna find another apartment for that price. I mean this one is twice as much, and it doesn't have parking. Does she like to park?

Quote.Speaker: Jim
Quote.Text: Oh, loves it.

Quote.Speaker: Pam
Quote.Text: Okay. This one is the same price but it's got...

Quote.Speaker: Jim
Quote.Text: Green walls.

Quote.Speaker: Pam
Quote.Text: I think that's mold.

Quote.Speaker: Jim
Quote.Text: Ooh... fancy.

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: Spiderman, Peter Parker, would not reveal his love for Mary Jane for fear that she might be captured and harmed by the Green Goblin. Now, if Michael had studied the Spidey principles that I'd drawn up for him, Jan's boobs might not be all over the Internet. [Dwight pretends to shoot out webs from his palms]

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: Attention everyone! May I have your attention, please? Listen up. If we all work really hard and focus, we should be out of here in seven hours. Now, somewhere in these stacks, I have hidden a deck of cards. That should motivate you to keep your eyes open. If you find the deck of cards, you can redeem it with me in exchange for a free soft drink. [Jim shuffles the deck of cards] Get back... Back to work!

Quote.Speaker: Pam
Quote.Text: Yes, it is The Island Luau Inventory '07. It's actually a success compared to Disco Audit '05.

Quote.Speaker: Roy
Quote.Text: What's the problem?

Quote.Speaker: Ryan
Quote.Text: We have seven fewer boxes of Canariola copier paper in stock than we're supposed to.

Quote.Speaker: Roy
Quote.Text: Let me see this. [scans one box seven times] Looks good to me.

Quote.Speaker: Stanley
Quote.Text: I wouldn't have come, but I know Jan is showing up soon. I don't wanna miss the show.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: [Kelly singing] Hey! Hey! Stop your mouth, please.

Quote.Speaker: Kelly
Quote.Text: Eighty-six. Eighty-seven. [singing] Eighty-eight. Eighty-nine.

Quote.Speaker: Andy
Quote.Text: Hey Dwight, I bet I can stack faster than you can.

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: Please, I can double your pace.

Quote.Speaker: Andy
Quote.Text: Oh, yeah? Prove it, champ. You ready?

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: Let's go.

Quote.Speaker: Andy
Quote.Text: One, two, three, go!

Quote.Speaker: Jim
Quote.Text: [Dwight and Andy stacking boxes rapidly] Nice.

Quote.Speaker: Andy
Quote.Text: Get out of my way, Jim!

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: Jim, move!

Quote.Speaker: Jim
Quote.Text: Okay.

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: Okay.

Quote.Speaker: Andy
Quote.Text: Dang it.

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: Two at a time!

Quote.Speaker: Andy
Quote.Text: Those aren't straight. Totally crooked. Totally crooked. You're disqualified.

Quote.Speaker: Meredith
Quote.Text: [to herself] Be careful. [yells as boxes fall on her] Hello? I'm stuck!

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Hey, Stanley, in case I don't see you again after tonight, here is your bonus, $1,000 cash. Keep the change. [hands Stanley a piece of Jamaican currency]

Quote.Speaker: Stanley
Quote.Text: There is a butterfly on this. Why?

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: It is Jamaican. The exchange rate is 65-to-1. I don't remember in which direction.

Quote.Speaker: Stanley
Quote.Text: So it's either worth $15 bucks or $65,000.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Yes, good luck with that.

Quote.Speaker: Toby
Quote.Text: You know, I actually lived in Honolulu for a year.

Quote.Speaker: Kevin
Quote.Text: Oh, so you've been to a real luau.

Quote.Speaker: Toby
Quote.Text: Yeah.

Quote.Speaker: Kevin
Quote.Text: Yeah.

Quote.Speaker: Angela
Quote.Text: I tried. We didn't have time.

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: You're a box short on the black, medium-line ballpoints.

Quote.Speaker: Creed
Quote.Text: I don't know what to tell you.

Quote.Speaker: Creed
Quote.Text: One year, I had a close acquaintance of mine back a truck in here and clean out this whole place. That was a very good year. I think they blamed it on some kid.
